section.title: Welcome to CMO Catalogue
section.div:
>
CMO Catalogue
Online Catalogue for Metadata from CMO
public ALPHA 2017-02
Learn more »

div.p: Includes a short “welcome” text and logos of related institutions, with an option to change the language (English, German and Turkish – only the main text will be translated).

On the start page, there should be a search field for “Simple search” function within the catalogue. Next to/above/below the search field, there are two links/tabs directing the user to “Detailed search” and “Search lyrics” sections of the CMO Catalogue (similar to search fields of e.g. Bach Digital, ViFa Musik or Fundmünzkatalog). Details of some of the search pages are explained in appendixes V to IX.
